name: Bien Hoa
description: Bien Hoa is an industrial city in Dong Nai Province, known for its rapid urbanization and historical significance.
spots: Dong Nai Culture and Nature Reserve

name: Can Tho
description: Can Tho, the largest city in the Mekong Delta, is famous for its floating markets, rivers, and beautiful rural scenery.

name: Da Nang
description: Da Nang is a coastal city known for its sandy beaches, French colonial history, and proximity to historical sites.

name: Dalat
description: Dalat, located in the Central Highlands, is known for its cool climate, pine forests, and colonial architecture.

name: Ha Long
description: Ha Long is renowned for its emerald waters and thousands of towering limestone islands topped with rainforests.

name: Hanoi
description: Hanoi, the capital city, is known for its centuries-old architecture, rich culture, and bustling street life.

name: Ho Chi Minh City | Saigon
description: Ho Chi Minh City, formerly known as Saigon, is Vietnam's largest city, known for its vibrant culture and historical landmarks.

name: Hoi An
description: Hoi An is a well-preserved ancient town known for its mix of different cultures and beautiful lantern-lit streets.

name: Hue
description: Hue is known for its historic monuments, including the Imperial City, a vast complex of palaces, temples, walls, and gates.

name: Nam Dinh
description: Nam Dinh is a province in the Red River Delta region, known for its historical sites and cultural heritage.

name: Nha Trang
description: Nha Trang is a coastal city known for its beaches, diving sites, and the Po Nagar Cham Towers.

name: Phu Quoc
description: Phu Quoc is a Vietnamese island known for its white-sand beaches, resorts, and dense tropical jungle.

name: Quy Nhon
description: Quy Nhon is a coastal city known for its beaches, fishing villages, and Cham temples.

name: Sapa
description: Sapa is a town in the Hoang Lien Son Mountains, known for its terraced rice fields and ethnic minority villages.

name: Vung Tau
description: Vung Tau is a coastal city known for its beaches, colonial-era architecture, and the large Christ the King statue.
